website_summaries.verdict: This highly-rated onesie is a must-have for expectant couples and kangaroo-obsessed friends.
pros: Comes with ears, a tail, a pouch, and an included mini-kangaroo for snuggling or carrying
Non-footed design for easy shoe wear
cons: Included pockets cannot hold many items
Legs are shorter than some preferred

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Nice material. People loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to dress up for work...I’m glad I chose this. The cost was pretty good. I was afraid that it would be too warm...it is, but okay for work. The material is of a medium weight...and it was comfy. I’m a big boy, 6’, 285 pounds and it fit perfectly. That was a worry, but it turned out perfectly. I would recommend this item. I added some boxing gloves and hung them over my shoulder...
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. Harvie

customer_reviews.title: You won't want to take this off.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son for Halloween, and am growing concerned with how much he wears it. Sometimes he is just hanging out in the house in it. He wore it for 3 days straight right out of the package. Since then, he's grown aware that a teen can't just wander around dressed like a kangaroo deep into November...but sometimes I suspect he might be layering with it.
customer_reviews.author: Short latte

customer_reviews.title: It's a hit with all of the adult kids.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter as a Christmas gift. She loves onesies and Australia. As soon as she opened it, my son snatched it and put it on...then after he got too hot, she immediately put it on and has worn it quite a bit since Christmas. She loves it...now the other kids want one.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Morton

customer_reviews.title: I love the style of this onesie but some flaws put ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of this onesie but some flaws put it to the back of my closet. The quality of the garment is fine but like most 'one-size-fits-most' items, being taller means it won't fit. I'm 6'2" and ~180lbs and the Large size I got is way too wide but not long enough. One other issue is that, unlike most onesies, this doesn't button all the way down. So if you have to use the restroom you basically have to take it completely off. Good costume/joke item but not something you'd want to comfortably lounge around in.
customer_reviews.author: Conor Day

customer_reviews.title: Great for every occasion!
customer_reviews.text: Beware people may confuse you for a Pokémon despite clearly not being a Pokémon and that you have your child Joey in your belly!? Never mind that! But very comfy and warm. Great for every occasion!
customer_reviews.author: supjennifer

customer_reviews.title: fortunately he made his way back to me eventually
customer_reviews.text: Wore the Kangaroo set to a Onesie party, it was a big hit! The joey that comes with it was kidnapped by various guests most of the night, fortunately he made his way back to me eventually. I wore a size Medium and am 5'7/145 lbs, probably would've been fine with a small. Note: this thing is WARM! An hour into the party I had it mostly unbuttoned and had rolled up the legs. It will make for a lovely Snuggy substitute come winter time.
customer_reviews.author: S K

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, Cozy, and Cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a costume for a costume wedding reception that was outdoors and pretty cold. It kept me warm all night and everyone loved it, especially the little kids and the dog that was there who wanted to keep playing with my tail and the little Joey that it came with. A huge plus is it has a big pouch to hold things. The only thing i would change is to make the side pockets a little bit larger, but other than that it's great!!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Walden

customer_reviews.title: Super baggy, as I believe it should be
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6 155lb; I bought a large and it fits perfectly!! Super baggy, as I believe it should be, and it reaches my ankles and wrists.
customer_reviews.author: K Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item 3 times... I'm 5'6" and 160 pounds (pregnant Mama) My first order was an XL, since I'm pregnant, but I took it back because it was way too large. I order again, this time L, but it was still super large! Then finally I received the size M which fits perfectly as expected! It has very good quality and fun good looking!!! It's going to be my Halloween costume since I am expecting a baby!!! Lovely! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Mama McGee

customer_reviews.title: Who needs a purse when you have a pouch?
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Hilarious - Comfortable - Warm and Fuzzy - Pouch for snacks, keys, phone, or baby Cons: I don’t want to take off
customer_reviews.author: hilaurennicole

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but an odd fit
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun costume, though it was quite a bit baggier than expected. I'm guessing it is meant to be oversized since the legs of the outfit went part of the way down my legs, as shown in the product image. The joey, though minimalist in design, drew a lot of attention from everyone at the party. If you are worried about it falling out, safety pin it. I didn't have too much of an issue with that though.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymitea

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and garnered heaps of compliments!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Large and it was perfect to wear with jeans and a shirt underneath. I'm slim and 5'10" and really glad I didn't buy a Medium. I wore this on a onesie bar crawl and it got a lot of compliments. The Joey and tail are great added touches.
customer_reviews.author: Sang

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely soft and comfortable. Beyond the pouch, there were also two side pockets, which was great. My only complaint was that it was a little short- I'm only 5'4", and the legs rode up n my ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Soft fabric, comfortable fit, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Wore this for Halloween Winnie Pooh theme at work and with the kids. It was a hit. Little kanga is secured with a plastic cord and easily removable. Soft material. Good fun
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Super cozy!
customer_reviews.text: The sizing chart is accurate. I didn’t pay attention to the sizing chart based on height and got a size L for my 6’2” bf and it was about 2 inches short (not a big deal). This material is INCREDIBLY SOFT. And VERY COZY. I wore the squirrel costume to sleep and it’s almost like a pillow by itself! So so soft. The baby Joey is removable, but comes attached by a small string to stay if you want. Very satisfied with this purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy! I should have ordered a size smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy! I should have ordered a size smaller though. My height was right on the cusp of Large of X-Large (I'm 5'9"), so I went with the X-Large one because I wanted to make sure it was long enough. It is very large on me, but I'm still very fond of it. Plus, the joey is adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha C.

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: This onesie fits loose enough for comfort and is warm on a windy night of trick-or-treating. The pocket kandaroo baby is adorable and a great conversation starter. I will definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Williams

customer_reviews.title: Size down and buy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! As pictured. Totally forgiving in terms of sizing. I usually wear a L/XL in women’s pants. M/L in tops. I got the medium and there is still PLENTY of room to spare all over. Good price. Warm. Excellent last minute Halloween find for me!
customer_reviews.author: chicogirl61

customer_reviews.title: Simply adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: We were so worried this was going to be super huge on my daughter. She is a very petite 14 year old at 4'11". But it said it would fit her height so we took a chance. It is awesome! Big and roomy, but not huge. It's thick, fuzzy and warm and seems to be of good quality!
customer_reviews.author: A. Gullo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for my husband and I for a Halloween party. We both love them! They’re so soft and comfy. You won’t want to take them off. The little baby kangaroo is detachable. I like the giant pocket in the front cause I could throw my phone in there for the party.
customer_reviews.author: jasmine smith

customer_reviews.title: Fun, easy, comfy! Runs BIG
customer_reviews.text: This was an easy, fun costume. It is VERY LARGE which for me is a good thing, but know when ordering that their sizing isn’t kidding. They run BIG. I was able to machine wash it, which is great. It was comfy too!
customer_reviews.author: Pat McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding costume!
customer_reviews.text: So I got the extra large as I am a bit on the bigger size. But it was too large for me. Most made in China clothing is usually too small but this is not. Very roomy and comfortable. Warm! Everybody loved it! Got a lot of compliments. Hood stayed on all night!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great easy costume for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty hilarious. They do run large though so you can probably go down a size. The cuffed bottoms essentially make it adjustable for any height so that is really helpful. It seems they have solved the problem of the little Joey falling down as it is now fixed in the pocket which is nice. It can tell it is going to be warm.
customer_reviews.author: K. Crafts

customer_reviews.title: Fun one piece, good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected, super soft material, very cute. Seems to be pretty well made considering how inexpensive it was. The joey (kangaroo baby) tore out after putting it in the wash, but was easily sewn back in by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: This is the cutest...
customer_reviews.text: My friend and I got these for a recent event. At said event awesome things happened (not directly related to the costume, but it sure helped me get on stage!). They are adorable, perfectly well made, and many strangers will be inspired to compliment you in them. BOUNCE!
customer_reviews.author: paytonitforward

customer_reviews.title: 34B) so I had a bit more fabric to work with and it wouldn't ride up and it was perfect. Got this for a beanie baby Halloween costume ...
customer_reviews.text: I sized up on this to a large (I'm 5'7", 137lbs, 34B) so I had a bit more fabric to work with and it wouldn't ride up and it was perfect. Got this for a beanie baby Halloween costume and it was a huge hit. Super warm and comfy, and my little cousins loved having a kangaroo babysit them months later too. One of my favorite purchases ever, haha.
customer_reviews.author: Metal mel

customer_reviews.title: Not bad quality at all
customer_reviews.text: Wore this on Halloween. It was much cheaper than most of the onesies I saw but it’s good quality and got a lot of laughs.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly and is super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Had a onesie party coming up and needed something to wear to it. I was a bit worried ordering online, as I am a big guy, 6'1" and 285lbs, crossed my fingers and went with the XL. Once I got it here and tried it on, I was relieved to see it fit and had some room to spare. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Snuggly!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6' and almost 200 pounds I was very concerned about it not fitting however it fits great it's very comfortable inside I would highly recommend this as a gift for someone special
customer_reviews.author: Michael King

customer_reviews.title: comfy and baggy
customer_reviews.text: this thing is awesome! I bought it for raves and love wearing it to shows. however, it is very baggy. I order a larger and am 5'9'' but probably should have ordered a medium. this is also extremely hot, the material is rather thick.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: The inner kid in you will love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenage daughter who is 5'9" and it fits her perfect! I bought her a large and it is very roomy and comfortable - she wears it almost daily. :) It looks so comfy that I am thinking about buying one for myself. The material is not too thick so she can wear it without being hot. We will new buying quite a few of these as xmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Samoans

customer_reviews.title: Warm, Good Quality, and Freaking Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This onesie is so freaking adorable. I ordered the medium and it fits a 5' 3" and approx. 150 lb woman great--of course, it's loose and baggy, but it's supposed to be. It's very warm and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Funny, comfy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter can't stop wearing it, even more than a week after Halloween. So comfy the loves it and stay in it from the she comes back from school to when she gets into bed.
customer_reviews.author: Oli WA

customer_reviews.title: Female version is great but not male version
customer_reviews.text: Male version looks weird. The low bottom doesn't make sense make it look saggy and we hated that.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pajama
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift. The material is very soft and the fitting is nice and loose near the body. The plush that came with the pajama of course is not of the best quality, but its about the pajama and not the plush. Overall the pajama was a great buy and its a bonus that this one has side pockets plus an additional front pouch :P
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: It's warm and comfortable. Enjoy
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'0 and 190 pounds, fit build, and I was really concerned about how this was going to fit. I ordered the Large and it worked out well. the legs run to about my shins but i don't care. It's roomy enough every other place. if you are going out for a onesie party, the pockets are a bit shallow. Just an FYI. It's warm and comfortable. Enjoy. ordered with next day delivery and got it the next day. Very happy all around.
customer_reviews.author: Bear Hawk Manatee

customer_reviews.title: Great Kangaroo PJ!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the PJ for my daughter as a custom for Camp Carnival this summer. She is 5'5" and weights 106 lbs. I ordered size Medium and she loves the way it fits : loose but perfect length. Size small would have been less baggy but too short. Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.author: lilian

customer_reviews.title: Im 6'2 375lbs and even tho was a little tight putting some stress on the buttons it was perfect. just about down to ankles
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews i decided to get the xl for halloween even tho i am normally a 3x. Im 6'2 375lbs and even tho was a little tight putting some stress on the buttons it was perfect. just about down to ankles. Im sure its made to be slept in but if anyone has a mustache and is trying to look like monterey jack (a mouse of course) from the rescue rangers this is just the thing for you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: Cute costume but was a little big. I'm only 5'2" and it was big around the legs and waist. But overall I really liked the costume and it kept me warm.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Anne Mongiardo

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend. Very comfortable and flexible with enough space to move around in. Might be a little short if you are above 6 feet tall.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Tan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Warm. Awesome Joey!
customer_reviews.text: Always brings a smile to people's faces. Love the Joey. Really comfortable. The buttons stop above the handy pouch, and isn't revealing. Definitely warm. Awesome for cold nights.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Uselton

customer_reviews.title: Just as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: The pajamas fit as expected. I had to secure the little Kangaroo as I was on a pub crawl and had to look out for the little guy. The outfit could use some toy boxing gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Roland

customer_reviews.title: Middle is huge, legs are small
customer_reviews.text: Mid section is HUGE but the legs are short and kind of bunched in the front to show a major camel situation in the front.
customer_reviews.author: AmyAmesTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great simple halloween costume!
customer_reviews.text: Wore it for walking around town with my son for halloween this year. Kept me nice and toasty warm and worked perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael & Samantha Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, soft, super warm
customer_reviews.text: So i got this for a “onesie” party, never expecting to wear it again. Well, I wear it around the house all the time now. Imagine the looks i get when im wearing this and standing in my front yard waiting for my dogs to go potty!!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Adorable. The joey fell out pretty quickly and I've ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. The joey fell out pretty quickly and I've since sewed it back in but this is a great one piece that I bust out every now and then for last minute Halloween/costume parties.
customer_reviews.author: Reid Marston

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Costume
customer_reviews.text: Awesome costume, super comfy, and warm! Made being pregnant on Halloween a breeze! Got compliments and felt good the whole day :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Cute and cozy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas PJ party and I got so many compliments. It was warm and not too stuffy. The fit was on point and the only draw back I would say is that the baby in the pouch tends to droop but that wasn't a deal breaker. Overall, good purchase and it served it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Lakerluve

customer_reviews.title: Best. Halloween. Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! We do themed Halloween costumes in our family every year and we went with animal themed. We got all Silver Lilly animal pjs (so we can keep wearing them!). Owl, kangaroo, panda and zebra. They are amazing! Perfect for Pacific NW Halloween where layers can be warn underneath and super adorably well-made. I got them purely on the reviews so thanks for everyone who rated them high!!! I'm 5'6" athletic 135lbs and a medium was baggy and perfect for light layer of clothes underneath.
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: A fun costume for many occasions
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a fun gift for a person we called Joey ( a small kangaroo.) Made well and has been worn several times .
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: so super cute. I love this
customer_reviews.text: so super cute. I love this. My friends and I are going on a cruise at the end of the month and we all decided to wear onsies at breakfast. Hands down I'm going to have the cutes pajamas of the bunch. It arrived faster than I expected and was even cuter than the picture shows. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Wren

customer_reviews.title: Fun to wear
customer_reviews.text: Kangaroo onesie arrived and was so fun to wear for a holiday party, actually slept in it too. I 5'7" ordered medium and had plenty of room to move around, not tight.
customer_reviews.author: Sun

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Kangaroo outfit
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old over 6 ft son has worn this kangaroo outfit at a Halloween cabaret recently and will continue to wear it as he finds it very comfortable and fun to wear. He has long legs and arms but the tall size fits him fine. Really good bargain for what you get. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great costume!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this for a Halloween party and it was so comfortable and cozy! Needed to secure the little Joey better but overall it was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Mamma

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Cozy
customer_reviews.text: It fit well. It’s very comfy. Only bad thing is that it doesn’t button all the way down so you basically have to take it off to pee.
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: Kangaroo jammas
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter. She has really enjoyed wearing them. I think everything in her room has ended up in the pouch at one time or another. She has had them for nearly a month now and they have held up well to numerous washings.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Great Halloween Costume/PJs
customer_reviews.text: As expected. My 12yo daughter loves it! We bought size small, it's baggy as she wanted, but not too big. We've wanted it twice so far (cold, line dry) and it's holding up well. She wears about 14 in kids or 0-2 pants in women's. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase of my life!! I bought it for a onesies bar crawl and everyone loved it!! I’ve found a few more occasions to wear it and every time I am in love! I had to sew the joey in a bit more so that I would lose him in the night, 10/10 if you want to buy this do it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: I would wear this every day for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Wore out on halloween and used the pouch for candy handouts. Im just gonna throw out there though that you should probably stop collecting candy in a body pouch in a kangaroo suit before your 20's.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Woodworth

customer_reviews.title: Soft, cuddly, yet durable costume
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. It is warm and soft and makes you want to cuddle up in it. Very good quality and comfortable. Size was just as expected and fits perfectly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: j.stimson

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a birthday gift for my boyfriend and he loves it. It’s incredibly soft and super cozy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Merriman

customer_reviews.title: worn in public
customer_reviews.text: embarrassed a high school senior on kidnap day by making them wear this
customer_reviews.author: JAMES FABLINGER

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfortable, and warm
customer_reviews.text: It was a hit at the Halloween party! People loved the baby Joey! Cute, comfortable, and warm!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Groovy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 6'3" guy and this fits pretty perfectly. Awesome onesie for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Karate

customer_reviews.title: Will probably run big on a smaller frame.  Would definitely size down if I was a smaller guy
customer_reviews.text: Great price, delivery on time and as promised. Well mad made and constructed for such a cheap price
customer_reviews.author: callmemoriarty

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, warm, easy care. I'm 5'2" and this covers my whole body perfectly. It could easily be worn by someone much taller, too! Satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: Superheroperson

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that stuffing came out of tail during first washing
customer_reviews.author: ursula67

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My son love this and the quality is good. Design is cute with the plush baby kangaroo in the pouch. But for tall guys I think this would a little short in length.
customer_reviews.author: Arch

customer_reviews.title: Great kangaroo costume!
customer_reviews.text: So comfy, so soft and the joey in the pouch is really cute!
customer_reviews.author: L. Strand

customer_reviews.title: Love this kangaroo outfit
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! It fit well except in the chest area.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Just get it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and it's very warm! I sleep in it about twice a week since my house is so cold.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: stuffed kangaroo not included
customer_reviews.text: The size and fit are great, but the small stuffed kangaroo for the pouch was not included.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: super soft, not too hot
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely obsessed with my kangaroo onesie. My boyfriend got a dinosaur and we hang out on the couch in them all the time. Well worth the money, super soft, not too hot, and friggin adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfy fit, wore it all day. Be prepared that it is warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Fits large
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design, but it was fairly large and after one wear had a small rip in the seam.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: ... in the 5'6 - 5'7" so the medium feels like it is just a little short in the legs
customer_reviews.text: If you are in the 5'6 - 5'7" so the medium feels like it is just a little short in the legs, but after reviewing the pictures, this might be by design.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E. Maiser

customer_reviews.title: ... a big lady 5'10 200+ lbs and I feel like a small person in this thing but that's not ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very big and I'm a big lady 5'10 200+ lbs and I feel like a small person in this thing but that's not a bad thing. I do wish it had a zipper instead of buttons the spaces in between the buttons are a good distance so someone could see through those gaps but just wear an undershirt. Overall I like the feel of it but I'm concerned about how it will fit after washing it.
customer_reviews.author: BlindWalrusFury

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'8" and 200lb. I got a medium and it fits fine. Though, it is a bit short for me. Everywhere else, I fit it fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sok

customer_reviews.title: A little large
customer_reviews.text: Bought an adult small, usually my daughters size tee shirt, but it was a bit long and baggy for her. She is about 5-3 and 110 lbs. but it is a very cute, comfortable and well constructed costume for a teenager on Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great costume. My son ordered the kangaroo and was a hit at the party. It's very soft. You really can sleep in it!
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: She is a happy camper!
customer_reviews.text: Teen daughter LOVES this thing. Cannot get her out of it. Warm and cozy. She is a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: michaelsina

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: The Joey is a bit loose, but I was glad they stitched it in or it might fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Spenny

customer_reviews.title: Cute and warm
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and fit well. Really comfortable too. Unfortunately this product came too late for Halloween, but I still use it for costume parties. Great for costume parties in the cold! I gave it 4 stars because it could use a little more room at the ankles and it came later than it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Campbell

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, fit me fine (a little big on me but i wanted it that way) as a 6’2 200lb man I got an XL. Also wore it snowboarding with only 2 layers underneath so that speaks to the warmth as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Shoop

customer_reviews.title: I lové the Joey!
customer_reviews.text: Im the cutest Kangaroo in the whole outback! Had to get this for work and it's hilariously perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I won at secret santa this year
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'7" and 215 lbs and it fit great. The girl I gave it to is my height but skinnier and says it's very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: RoxyQuinn

customer_reviews.title: Order down, good quality, floppy baby
customer_reviews.text: I ordered down a size after reading other reviews and I'm glad I did. The quality of the material seems good. The only downside is the baby joey is super floppy and falls over, then you can't tell what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Mel P

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this when the other company couldn't fullfil until after Halloween. It is nicer than the animal onesie my friend ordered. It was more expensive though than I had planned.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, it will keep you warm in does cold nights
customer_reviews.author: Elma L Celis

customer_reviews.title: This is the most comfortable onesie, I definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable onesie, I definitely recommend it. I wanted it to be a bit loose, and it is. It's incredibly warm, and the baby kangaroo is adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom for Christmas because she loves kangaroo's. She loved these PJ's!! They are super cute!
customer_reviews.author: LindsB

customer_reviews.title: Cute & comfy
customer_reviews.text: My 17 yr old used this as a Halloween costume. It fit great and he said it was very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: I wanted the legs to be a little scrunched like the guys in the picture
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5 and 138lbs I bought the medium and it fit perfectly. I wanted the legs to be a little scrunched like the guys in the picture. Perfect length, not to big or too small.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Comfy pajama for teenager
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product with fare price. My big kid loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Are you serious??
customer_reviews.text: Tomorrow is Halloween so I’ve just received and opened up the package to get ready for tomorrow. The tail is literally hanging onto the rest of the costume by a THREAD. Seriously???
customer_reviews.author: Emily Shum

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Super quick delivery. The kangaroo jammies are cute and adorable, and my 26 year old loves them. She thinks they fit fine, but I think they look a little short. It's a good thing she is very petite!
customer_reviews.author: DuckyDon

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. Very comfortable and cute. However, the tail gets in the way when you're sitting down and the crotch is set very low so it may be hard to walk up the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Way too large
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems fine, except is waaay too large, I would advice order one size down to your usual one. The fabric is also really warm, so you may sweat if you usea on not-so-cold weather. The quality is really good and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend in February, it is exactly what I was looking for. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Arbach

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: My son (teen) bought this for a party. He found it quite comfortable to wear and liked it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Pirates Fan

product_meta.title: Silver Lilly Plush Kangaroo One Piece Animal Costume Unisex Adult Cosplay Pajamas
feature_bullets: DETAILS - The adorable and eye-catching kangaroo onesie animal features a hood with eyes, teeth, and nose for full effect. Matching tails and chest designs help complete your ultimate cosplay look! Match with a pair of animal slippers (not included) for your next pajama party.

COZY - A special blend of comfort and fun, these plush materials are soft to the touch and will keep you warm during those cold winter months. The button up closure allows you to quickly get dressed while the loose fit gives you the flexibility to easily wear over your existing clothes or jacket.

VERSATILE - Loose fitting materials allow you the flexibility of movement while maintaining style and comfort. The fun and whimsical designs will make sure you get noticed at your next furry convention or party. Carry your remote or keys around with you thanks to two front pockets.

CLEANING - Take good care of your new onesie to prevent fading! The comfortable polyester material is recommended to be hand washed and laid flat to dry. If ironing is required, it is recommended to do so on Low heat only.

SIZING - Model pictured is 6' and 150 lbs, wearing size Large. Available in sizes Small through X-Large fitting adult heights from 4'9" to 6'2" - Sizes are approximate as follows: Small fits 4'9" - 5'4"; Medium fits 5'1" - 5'9"; Large fits 5'5" - 6'; X-Large fits 5'9" - 6'4".
